# base

**Instance Property**

The underlying data frame.

## Declaration

```swift
var base: DataFrame { get }
```

## Inspecting a Slice

- **shape**: The number of rows and columns in the slice.
- **columns**: The entire slice as a collection of columns.
- **rows**: The entire slice as a collection of rows.

items.description: The number of rows and columns in the slice.
items.name: shape

items.description: The entire slice as a collection of columns.
items.name: columns

items.description: The entire slice as a collection of rows.
